alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Itasca, southeastern Koochiching and northwestern St. Louis Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1145 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Littlefork, to 6 miles southeast of Marcell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hibbing and Ash Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis
